original: This is a native American tribe. It is ruled by a tribal council under the leadership of a chief.
translation: 一个由酋长领导下的部落议会统治的美洲原住民部族。

original: The Native Council is as an assembly of elders that is led by a joint chief.
translation: 原住民议会是由一名联合酋长领导的长老大会。

original: The Siberian Council is as an assembly of elders that is led by a joint chief.
translation: 西伯利亚原住民议会是由大酋长领导的长老大会。

original: A monarchy is a form of government where a sole monarch is the head of the state. A monarch rules for life and the title is often hereditary within their dynasty.
translation: 君主制是一种由唯一的君主担任国家首脑的政府形式。君主终身统治，王位通常在其家族内世袭。

original: In a Feudal kingdom the power of the Monarch is enhanced by a land owning aristocracy sworn to obey them. The aristocrats, or nobles, are often landowners in their own right, with considerable influence and vassals of their own.
translation: 在一个封建王国中，君主的力量通过拥有土地的贵族的宣誓效忠而得到加强。这些贵族，或者说尊贵之人往往是土地的所有者，拥有相当大的影响力和自己的附庸。

original: Autocratic monarchies concentrate power in the hands of the ruler. The state is often seen as their personal property. It is not uncommon for rulers to have ministers and supporters, but these are then referred to as members of the royal household.
translation: 专制君主制将权力集中在统治者手中。国家通常被视为他们的个人财产。统治者拥有阁僚和支持者的情况并不少见，但这些人一般会被当成王室成员看待。

original: A plutocratic kingdom is one where the supporters of the Monarch are those with the largest incomes. The monarch themself is often the head of a successful merchant enterprise, and so are many of their supporters.
translation: 一个财阀王国，其君主的支持者是那些拥有最高收入的财阀。君主本身往往是一个成功的商业公司的领袖，君主的支持者也是如此。

original: By strengthening the ties between the state and successful merchant enterprises, we can increase our reach out into the world as well as the profit we bring home.
translation: 通过加强国家与成功的商业公司之间的联系，我们可以扩大我们的业务范围以及我们带回的利润。

original: Ruled by a Muslim minority the Sultanates of India have had to evolve and expand the traditional Muslim ideas of Kingship. While they remain Islamic states the role of the Dhimmi, traditionally encompassing Jews and Christians, have been extended to the Dharmic religions.
translation: 作为统治者的穆斯林在国内属于少数派，印度苏丹国不得不改进和扩展传统的穆斯林王权理念。虽然他们仍然是伊斯兰国家，但传统意义上仅包含犹太教徒和基督徒的齐米这一身份已扩展到达摩宗教。

original: While Bengal and the Ganges Delta are rich lands, the estuary has always attracted traders and acted, above all else, as the port to India. This land was taken with sword in hand but ship owners and traders are as influential and as vital to our state as noble officers.
translation: 孟加拉邦和恒河三角洲不仅是宜耕的沃土，最重要的是，作为通往印度的河口，这里一直是商人及商业的乐园。这片土地的领主已屈服于我们手中的剑，但这里的商人及船主对我们而言和这片土地的领主具备同样的重要性和影响力。

original: The most popular disciples of Islam in this foreign land have always been the Sufis. They incorporate parts of the local traditions and take an active part in the daily life of the local population. Many of them have taken on the role of local leaders and, if we support them, we may see their communities grow as they reclaim land from jungles and swamps to build new cities.
translation: 在这片异国之地上，最受欢迎的伊斯兰门徒一直是苏菲派。他们对当地习俗包容并蓄，积极参与当地人的日常生活。他们中的许多人担任了当地领袖。如果我们支持他们，我们会见证其族群在开荒拓土、建立新城中的发展壮大。

original: The noble class has served our state well for generations and as it grows it is only fitting that we continue to confer great privileges to those families that have devoted themselves to our cause.
translation: 国内的望族子孙数代都在为国效力，在国家兴旺起来后，理应继续给这些为国效力的人提供特权。

original: As the state grows it is becoming more and more apparent that the old noble families have too much influence and power. Their jealous concern for their old privileges is greatly hindering the growth of our government.
translation: 随着国家的发展，勋贵们掌控了越来越多的权力和影响力。他们对特权无止境的贪欲，极大地阻碍了国家发展。

original: A centralized bureaucracy is centered on the capital of the kingdom, with most decisions made by, or near, the ruler and then sent out to the provinces.
translation: 集权官僚制以王国首都为核心，大多数的决议由统治者及其近臣制定，而后下达各省。

original: A decentralized bureaucracy leaves more decisions to local administrators or governors, who are then responsible to the monarch.
translation: 分权官僚制将更多决定权下放给对君主负责的地方官员或政府。

original: The clergy already possess many of the skills we look for in administrators. They are well educated, experienced scribes and they have a higher calling. In many ways allying ourselves with the clergy would offer an efficient and very strong cadre of administrators.
translation: 神职人员已然掌握了许多作为行政人员的技能。他们受过教育，精于文书工作，且号召力一流。我们可以更多地仰赖这些神职人员，以使我们的行政机关更高效更强力。

original: The noble families of the realm have sworn to provide not only council but also eternal loyalty to our monarch. As our realm expands it is clear that these duties cannot be solely performed by serving us with sword in hand. It is time for a new generation of nobles to serve, in robes and armed with pens they will aid the state just as well as their brothers do with their swords and armor.
translation: 王国的贵族们不仅要效忠于贵族议会，还应效忠于君主。当国家变得越来越大时，贵族们的职责便不限于为国作战了。新一代的贵族将披上长袍，手持钢笔，和他们那些披坚持锐的兄弟们一同为国家服务。

original: We cannot let old privileges govern who will get the privilege of serving our kingdom as it grows. Instead we must look only to the ability of each and every one. A meritocratic system is one where administrators are chosen for their talent, and not their parents.
translation: 勋贵门阀垄断朝政实不足取，选贤任能方为正道。选贤举能，得其才而忘其身。

original: It is time we separate the head of government from the head of state and give the legislative assemblies of the land a larger share in the day to day rule of our state.
translation: 政府首脑与国家元首理应由不同的人担任，以使立法院在治国上掌握更大的权力。

original: The Monarch rules supreme in this country and loyalty is valued above all else. We must ensure that decrees from the royal court are followed to the letter, and in in all parts of our country.
translation: 我们的君主至高无上，对其的忠诚高于一切。我们必须确保全国各地都遵守君主的法令。

original: The Nobility served us well over the centuries, and has become an integral part of our government. In order to better control, reward, and gain the support of these ancient aristocratic families we must continue to tie them closely to our royal person and the royal court.
translation: 贵族为我们服务了数个世纪，已然成为政府的一部分。为了更好地控制、奖励和获得这些贵族的支持，我们必须延续他们与王室和王族的密切联系。

original: By a Union of States with representatives in the States General we can more easily deal with the pro-federal movements in our nation while retaining our Monarchy.\n\nThrough elections and events, the §YStatists§! and §YMonarchists§! will vie for control over the nation. The effects of this reform and the frequency of elections depend on which faction is currently in power.
translation: 通过将各州代表拉入等级议会中，我们可以在保留君主制的前提下有效地安抚国内的共和派系。\n\n§Y议会派§!和§Y保皇派§!将通过选举和事件争夺国家的控制权。而生效的派系修正和选举的频率取决于当前的掌权派系。

original: The ancient privileges of the estates must be respected and their role in legislation be strengthened. Let us regularly call the general estates as a way to guide and counsel our great ruler.
translation: 必须尊重三级会议这一古老的光荣传统，加强其在立法中的作用。让我们定期召集各阶级代表，为我们伟大的统治者做出指导和忠告。

original: Without order there is nothing but chaos and men must be led. We must ensure that the word of our monarch is law in each and every case and that everyone does their utmost to realize every royal design.
translation: 没有秩序便只剩下混乱，人民需要被领导。我们必须确保在任何情况下君主之言即为法律，每个人必须尽其所能达成吾主所愿。

original: The legislative assemblies of this land are an imperative part of our state and by strengthening their role we ensure efficiency as well as the legitimacy of our kingdom.
translation: 地方议会是我国不可或缺的一部分，通过加强它们的作用，我们确保了效率和王国的合法性。

original: The best of the state is best served through the realization of the plans and will of its monarch. A true and enlightened monarch can then utilize its full capacity to undertake the many changes needed to ensure prosperity.
translation: 君主的计划和意志被高效实施可使国家达到其极限（不管好坏）。一个贤明的的君主可以充分施展其才能以在各种领域进行调整从而实现国家繁荣。

original: By separating the legislative body into more than one house we can better balance the need for change with the one to conserve and preserve the traditions of old.
translation: 通过将立法机构分成多个议院，我们可以更好地在保留传统与发起改革之间取得平衡。

original: Monarchy has run its course for this country. It is time we reform the government at its very top and institute a republic with electable rulers.
translation: 君主制在这个国家已经到头了，是时候改革政府高层，建立一个选举共和国了。

original: Religion is the only truly viable way to judge right and wrong. Let us reform the government at its very core and have the divine guide us from now on.
translation: 我们的教义是唯一正确的判断是非的标准。现在让我们从根本上改造政府，让神灵来指引我们。

original: In an Oligarchy the ruler is elected from a group of very influential persons at the very top of society. This ruling class is also the only group that the head of government answers directly to and it is their support the state relies upon.
translation: 在寡头制中，统治者是由社会上最有影响力的那些人选出的。该阶级是政府首脑唯一的直接效忠对象，同时也是国家的支柱。

original: Our region never had many kings, instead it is our dukes that have united and led the various peoples within our borders to greatness.
translation: 我们的国家从未有过混乱的纷争，在我们伟大的公爵统治下境内各民族皆精诚团结。

original: Due to our history of persecution the organization of our state is built around being able to quickly react to outside threats. We are a confederation of Misls, that each consists of a community and its army.
translation: 鉴于我们的迫害历史，我们国家的组织建立在能够快速应对外部威胁的基础之上。我们是锡克联盟，每个联盟体都由一个社团及其军队组成。

original: With the Khalsa united behind us there is little we could not do.\nWe cannot however become the oppressors we have once fought, all will be able to rise to power within our state.
translation: 有卡尔萨跟我们并肩战斗，我们没什么做不到的。\n然而我们不能变成我们曾经斗争过的统治者那样，在我们国内任何人都能上台掌权。

original: A Rajput kingdom is ruled through close ties of loyalty and kinship with the clans of the ruling dynasty and their retainers. As the head of a Rajput clan we have a long and strong tradition of martial prowess that we can rely on. Whenever war or disaster comes near we can call upon our supporters both from within the kingdom and in nearby regions.
translation: 一个拉杰普特王国通过与统治家族及其仆从们的忠诚和亲属关系来统治整个国家。作为一个拉杰普特部落的首领，我们有历史悠久且值得信赖的强大武术传统。无论何时，一旦战争或灾难向我们靠近，我们就能召唤出国内及附近地区的支持者们来战斗。

original: In order to better control the land and to further our military ambitions we have divided many of our possessions among Nayaks. Nayaks are expected to care for them, any cities, temples or other settlements within them as well as to produce the armies we need to defend and expand our kingdom.
translation: 为了更好地控制土地并进一步实现我们的军事野心，我们将许多的财产分配给了纳亚克。纳亚克们需要关注城市、寺庙以及其他定居点的发展，以及产生我们所需要的能够保卫王国以及进行扩张的军队。

original: Our lands are full of smaller local tribes and clans that we could put to good use if we gave them a place within the system of our state. As a class these Poligar officials could serve as police, builders of fortifications, local representatives and military officers. Most of all they could mobilize their kinsmen and provide us with a good source of able men.
translation: 我们的土地上充斥着各种小型本地部族和氏族，如果我们在国家体制中给予他们一席之地，我们就可以充分利用他们。作为一个阶层，这些波里伽尔官员可以担任警察，防御工事的建造者，本地代表以及军官。最重要的是，他们可以动员自己的亲属，成为我们获得人才的良好来源。

original: A Plutocratic Republic is one where wealth and trade dictate the agenda. The ruler is elected from among the most influential merchant families within the state and will have to rely on their support.
translation: 一个财阀共和国，其国家政策由财富和贸易决定。统治者从国内最有影响力的商人家族中选出，且十分依赖这些商人的支持。

original: In this Republic the right to rule is hereditary within certain noble families. These families elect the ruler from within their own group and this head of government will also have to rely on their support.
translation: 在这个共和国，统治权在某些贵族家庭中是世袭的。这些家族从他们自己的团体中选出统治者，而且政府首脑也必须依靠他们的支持。

original: Gondwana is a land of jungles, hills and forts but most of all it is a land of many tribes. Controlling this land means affording various minor power holders a large degree of self rule and privilege. Forts are imperative to control the various groups within our kingdom and controlling them will allow us to command the loyalties of the Gond people.
translation: 冈瓦纳是丛林、丘陵和堡垒之地，但最重要的是那里生活着许多的部族。控制这片土地意味着要为这些小型统治者提供很大程度的自治和特权。然而堡垒是控制我们国家内各种群体所必须的，控制它们将使我们能够掌握冈瓦纳人民的忠诚。

original: Deccan was only recently conquered by Islamic states and our ancestors were reliant on immigration to be able to staff and maintain their state. Over time this has created a cosmopolitan state of newcomers, second generation Deccanis and old Hindu aristocrats.
translation: 德干只是近来才被伊斯兰国家所征服，我们的祖先依赖移民来获得维持国家所需的工作人员。随着时间的推移，这创造了一个新型的全球化国家——第二代德干人以及旧的印度贵族。

original: Over time it has become evermore clear that we cannot trust either our conflict prone amirs or the local land holders. If we are to acquire officials and commanders we can trust we must look to recruit elite slaves to fill these positions instead.
translation: 随着时间推移，我们已经清晰的认识到我们既不能信任与我们有冲突的埃米尔也不能信任本地地主。如果我们想要获得值得信赖的政府官员和指挥官，我们必须寻求招募精英奴隶来填补这些职位。

original: As our kingdom grows and matures a joint Deccani culture has started to emerge among the elite of the various great cities of the Deccan. They all speak a common language, Dakhni, that is an amalgam of the local tongues, Persian and Turkic. Let us make good use of this elite culture in our administration and employ administrators that will be able to quickly redeploy from one end of our country to the other.
translation: 随着我国的崛起与成熟，一个结合德干高原各城之精华的复合德干文化开始出现。一些语言能在人们中间通行，比如德干语（一些本地方言的总称）、波斯语或土耳其语。让我们将这种精英文化充分运用到管理中，并启用那些能迅速适应在不同地区工作要求的管理人才。

original: This is a free Imperial city that has been granted special rights and privileges by the Emperor himself.
translation: 这是一个被皇帝亲自授予各种特权的自由市。

original: In this state an appointed dictator exercises almost absolute power over the state.
translation: 在该国，一个被任命的独裁者对国家行使几乎绝对的权力。

original: While it is no Monarchy, this republic values law and order above all else and will act forcefully to ensure that the authority of the central government is respected throughout the country.
translation: 虽然并非君主政体，但是这个共和国重视法律和秩序，会采取铁腕手腕维护中央政府在国内的权威。

original: In this country a number of families have over time emerged as very willing to assume the responsibilities of state. So much so that it has become both expected of them to shoulder that responsibility, and expected of the state to offer it to their scions.
translation: 在这个国家里已经有一些家族随时间推移表现出了承担国家责任的愿望。这份愿望是如此之强，以致于他们不仅希望有责任交给他们自己承担，还希望国家也能让族内的新人有所担当。

original: This Republic has made itself a guardian of Republican ideals, citizen power and everyone working together for the common good.
translation: 这个共和国已经成为了共和精神、公民权利以及为共同利益奋斗之理念的捍卫者。

original: Long terms make rulers reckless and the very idea that someone would rule for a long time is contrary to the very idea of a republic. Let us reform our election system to ensure better accountability from our elected officials.
translation: 长任期使统治者恣意妄为，更何况一个人长期统治国家本来就与共和理念背道而驰。让我们改革选举制以确保能对所选官员更好地问责。

original: The current terms for officials are too short to see through larger projects. This only feeds populism and leads to short-sighted policies. Let us reform our election system to allow for longer terms so that our elected officials have the power they need to conduct their office.
translation: 我们当前官员的任期太短，无法实施长远的规划。这只会滋生民粹主义，导致目光短浅的政策。让我们改革我们的选举制度，允许更长的任期，这样我们选出的官员就能更好地施展他们的抱负。

original: In order for our administration to be efficient we must allow provincial governments the freedom they need to perform their functions. Local elections will ensure that trustworthy individuals can be appointed who would then answer to the central government.
translation: 为使我们的行政部门有效率，我们必须给予省级政府履行其职能所需的自由。地方选举将确保可以任命可信赖的个人以便回应中央政府。

original: Let us divide the state into geographic regions ruled and administered by officials appointed by our central government.
translation: 让我们将国家划分为不同的地理区域，然后由中央政府任命的官员进行统治和管理。

original: Rather than one unified state our country has grown from a large number of states integrated into one confederacy. As our administration grows and evolves we must not infringe on the rights of the member states, doing so would trample on the very principles of our existence.
translation: 我们的国家并非由一个统一的国家发展而来的，而是由多个国家组成的邦联。随着我们政府的发展壮大，我们不能侵犯各加盟国的权利，因为这样做会践踏我们最根本的原则。

original: The Chairman or President of our governing body must be elected separately from the legislative branch of government. The president can then appoint or dismiss members of the government.
translation: 行政机构的主席或总统必须与政府的立法部门分开进行选举。总统可以任命或者解雇政府成员。

original: As the country grows so does the need to be able to act swiftly and efficiently. The only way to ensure this is by broadening the powers of the executive branch so that it has the tools it needs.
translation: 随着国家发展，我们越来越需要快速高效地行动。实现这点的唯一方法是扩大我们行政机构的权力，使其拥有所需的工具。

original: No single person can rule a country as big and complex as ours. Collecting such powers in the hand of one ruler is also contrary to the Republican ideals of our ancestors.\nDecentralization and Devolution is how we can best remain able to dynamically meet the needs of an ever-growing state.
translation: 没有单个的人能够统治我们这样大且复杂的国家。由一位统治者集权也违背了我们祖先的共和理念。\n权力的分散与下放是我们能够动态地满足不断发展的国家需求的最好方式。

original: As a Republic the guiding principles of our state must be those that further the efficiency of the political apparatus and the political ideals.
translation: 作为共和国，能够进一步提高政府机构以及政治理念效率的原则才是我们国家的指导原则。

original: One of the primary functions of the state is to uphold good and moral values. As our Republic in many ways relies on the good and virtuous behavior of its citizens corruption and sinful behavior must be counteracted and rooted out for the good of the entire country.
translation: 国家的主要职能之一是维护良好的道德观。由于我们的共和国在许多方面都依赖于公民的良善行为，因此必须抵制和消除腐败、罪恶等行为，以便造福整个国家。

original: The landholders are at the heart of power in any society and our state is no exception. Let us extend the power to vote to all those that have land and grade their number of votes in accordance with the size of their properties.
translation: 在任何社会，地主均处于权力的中心，在我国也是如此。让我们提升地主们的投票权，根据他们资产的多少将其选票数分级。

original: A Republic relies on its citizens to function and so it is only right that each citizen in our state will have the power to vote for who will guide our country. Attaining the privilege of being a citizen will also be a spur for all those under our rule to strive for good conduct.
translation: 共和国的运转依赖于公民，因此每个公民都应拥有投票权，来选择谁来领导我们的国家。获得成为公民的特权同样将会成为一个有效的催化剂，来激励我们治下所有人民去良好表现。

original: Unfortunately votes can be bought and old loyalties may cloud the judgment among some electors. Let us implement a system where a semi-random person can be chosen from a pool of good candidate for important offices.
translation: 不幸的是，由于可以贿选，以及旧日的忠诚可能会使一些选民的判断蒙上阴影。让我们实施一个系统，系统可以为重要的职位从优秀候选人才库中半随机地选择人员。

original: Let us open up the availability of important offices to more of those living within our borders so that we have a wider and more representative selection of civil servants.
translation: 让我们向更多居住在我们境内的人开放重要职位，以便我们有更广泛和更具代表性的公务员选拔。

original: Republicanism has served us well but it is time we empower a strong ruler to take our state into a new era.
translation: 共和制为我们提供了很好的帮助，但现在是我们赋予强大统治者权力的时候了，这将使我们的国家进入一个新时代。

original: Divine guidance and not popular support must be the governing rule in our state. Let us appoint someone who will truly care for the moral well-being of our subjects.
translation: 我们国家的治理准则是神的指引而非民众的支持。让我们任命真正关心我们主体道德福祉的人。

original: Especially in a Republic the authority and strength of the state is of the utmost importance. We must strengthen central power and ensure that each and every decision made in our capital reaches every corner of our country.
translation: 国家的权威和力量至关重要，特别是在共和国。我们必须加强中央集权，确保首都的每一项决议都能到达我国的任何一个角落。

original: Safeguarding the Republican values upon which this country has been built is the only way to ensure a successful evolution of our state.
translation: 维护建立这个国家的共和价值观是确保我们国家成功发展的唯一途径。

original: This state is a tribe. While there is a clear leader and aristocracy it does not have the government institutions of a Monarchy or Republic.
translation: 这个国家是一个部落。虽然有一个明确的领导者以及贵族，但它没有君主制或共和国的政府机构。

original: Martial values have always been important in our society and as we expand a militarized society is what we must continue to build and preserve at the core of our state.
translation: 军事价值观在我们的社会中一直很重要，在扩大军事化社会的过程中，我们必须继续建设和维持我们国家的核心。

original: No state can exist with only warriors. We must build up stronger ties with civil society and the urbanites in our realm so that we can better extract revenue from them.
translation: 只有战士的国家不会久存。我们必须与国内的民间社会和城市居民建立更加紧密的联系，以便我们能够更好地从中获取财政收入。

original: While clan loyalties can take us far our expansion has made us the masters of more peoples than we once did. A strongly religious society can withstand expansion in both time and space more efficiently and will give us the cohesion we need.
translation: 虽然氏族忠诚可以带领我们走得很远，但我们的扩张使得我们成为了比以往更多民族的主人。一个强烈的宗教社会可以更有效地承受时间和空间上的扩张，并提供给我们所需的凝聚力。

original: While it is important to observe religious practices to maintain our legitimacy we should not get bogged down in the principles of righteous rule and morality. Pragmatism will take us longer and allow us to support a larger state and army.
translation: 虽然遵守宗教习俗来维护我们的合法性是重要的，但我们不应该陷入合法统治和道德原则的困境中。实用主义将使得我们更加长久，并允许我们维持更大的国家和军队。

original: We are too reliant on the loyalties of the clans and tribes within our state. Let us instead start to build up institutional loyalty and divide the responsibilities of the state between formal offices under our ruler.
translation: 我们过于依赖国内氏族和部落的忠诚。让我们开始建立机构忠诚度，并将国家的职责分配给我们统治者下的正式官员。

original: Any form of modernization must preserve the ancient hierarchies of the clans and tribes within our nation. Without the support of these groups our country will not be able to expand and thrive as it has up to now.
translation: 任何现代化的改革都必须保留我们国家氏族与部落们古老的等级制度。没有他们的支持，我们的国家将无法像迄今为止一样扩张和繁荣。

original: It is time we abandon our tribal trappings and create a fully fledged monarchy carried by institutions and not clan loyalties.
translation: 是时候放弃我们的部落服饰，创造一个由典章制度而不是依靠氏族忠诚承担的完全成熟的君主制国家。

original: We must guard the liberties of our citizens and form a state where the head of government is not hereditary but instead elected from those with the right qualities.
translation: 我们必须保护我们公民的自由，成立一个国家，其政府首脑不是世袭的而是选举出的具有正确品质的人。

original: Religious guidance is the road forward for our people. Let us involve the clergy in the rule of our nation and reap the rewards of a just and
translation: 宗教指导着我国人民的前进道路。我们让教士参与国家的治理，从而获得公正的回报以及

original: The steppes call for our people. Let us abandon the sedentary traditions of our ancestors and fully embrace the free life of the open plains.
translation: 大草原呼唤着我们的人民。让我们放弃祖先定居的传统，完全拥抱开阔平原的自由生活吧。

original: This country is ruled by the members of a Monastic Order. The order's hierarchy and rules replaces the need for most laws and administration.
translation: 这个国家由骑士团的成员统治。骑士团的等级制度以及规则取代了大多数法律和行政管理的需要。

original: A political structure where the nation is governed by a spiritual leader, the Pope, the highest ranking office of the Roman Catholic Church.
translation: 一个由其精神领袖，教宗，罗马天主教廷最高级别人员，主导国家的政治机构。

original: This state is ruled by the clergy and uses the hierarchy of religious institutions for all government purposes.
translation: 该国由神职人员统治，并采用宗教机构来组建政府。

original: We must focus our energy on our religious mission within our country, to protect the faithful, feed the poor and fulfill our religious duties.
translation: 我们必须把精力集中到我们国内的宗教使命上，保护信徒，养活穷人，履行我们的宗教义务。

original: The spread of our holy faith must be our foremost mission and we cannot rest until we have defeated all enemies of our religion.
translation: 我们首要的使命必须是传播我们神圣的信仰，在打垮了神明的所有敌人之前我们不能休息。

original: It is our holy duty to look after the holy pilgrimage sites under our control and to protect any pilgrims within our lands.
translation: 我们有责任打理好在我们控制下的朝圣地，并保护我国领土内的朝圣者。

original: In the mission to spread the true faith we must never waver in our conviction and be ready to root out heresy wherever it springs up.
translation: 在传播真正信仰的使命中，我们的信念决不能动摇，并随时准备根除异端邪说。

original: As our state grows so does our exposure to wrongful teachings. We must not tolerate heathens or heretics within our walls. Instead these people can come live in our cities only if they convert to the true faith.
translation: 随着我们国家的发展，我们对接触到的异端分子与异教徒也越来越多。我们不能容忍我们的城墙内存在异端或异教徒。这些人只有在皈依了正确的信仰才能被允许活在我们的城市中。

original: Our growing bureaucracy requires loyal officials who will do their duty to the state and trust that we have the best interests of the faith at heart.
translation: 我们日益壮大的官僚机构需要忠诚的官员，他们将为国家尽自己的一份力，并坚信发自内心的忠诚对国家有利。

original: Religious conviction must be an integral part of our state in all its parts. When educating administrators among the clergy we must stress that they all get a sold grounding in theology so that they can take the right decisions at all times.
translation: 宗教信仰必须在我国各领域占据一席之地。在将神职人员培养成行政人员时，必须保证他们都有神学的基础，这样他们才能在任何时候都能做出正确的决定。

original: We must strengthen the rule and abilities of our leader so that we can at all times be certain that the divine will is being carried out in accordance to their designs.
translation: 我们必须加强我们领袖的权力和能力，以便我们能够在任何时候都确保神的旨意按计划得到执行。

original: Many have come to regard our leaders not only as great spiritual and worldly leaders but as semi-divine beings themselves. Many followers have in fact formed a type of order together for the following of our ruler in all ways that is required. Let us reform our country so that all our subjects are in fact members of our sect.
translation: 许多人已经不光将我们的领袖视为伟大的圣俗领袖，还将他们视为半神一样的存在。事实上，许多追随者已经共同形成了一套在一切所需方面追随我们领袖的秩序。让我们改革我们的国家，以使我们的全部臣民得以都成为我们教会的一员。

original: It is time we drop the trappings of religion and make our leader a monarch in own right.
translation: 是时候抛弃宗教的束缚，让我们的领袖加冕为王了。

original: While we must never stray far from our religious roots it is also important that we allow our state to evolve. Let us create a free republic where the head of state is elected from among the group of valid candidates freely.
translation: 虽然我们绝不能远离我们的宗教根源，但我们的国家发展也很重要。让我们创建一个自由共和国，并且从有效候选人中自由选出国家元首。

original: The Mandala System is used as a way to organize a state as a circle, or mandala, around a central metropolis. In this way the political and geographic realities can shape the level of direct control from the center. From subject states in the periphery to the more directly controlled sub cities closer to the center.
translation: 曼荼罗制度是围绕中心大都市构建一个圆形或曼荼罗的规划来组织整个国家。通过这种方式，政治和地理现实可以按照中央的直接控制水平来划分，从边缘更为独立的属地到更靠近中央的直接控制的城市。

original: If there is one thing our dynasty has learned over the centuries it is that we must be able to adopt to the local population in the regions we expand into. Let us ensure that we learn from those we conquer so that our empire can keep growing.
translation: 如果我们的王朝在几个世纪中学到了一件事，那就是我们必须接纳我们扩张的地区的原住民。让我们确保从我们征服的人那里学习，以便我们的帝国能够不断发展。

original: Our empire requires loyal and able servants. Let us reforge our noble class according to a numerical mansab system. Each noble will be given a rank, corresponding to both his obligation and will then be assigned lands around the empire by our administration to support him in accordance with his rank. The guiding principle for how highly someone is ranked must be ability, and this route must be open regardless of religion or origin. Only this way can we be sure to raise a court of those most able to bring our empire forward.
translation: 我们的帝国需要忠实而有能力的臣仆。让我们根据数字化的曼萨布制重塑我们的贵族阶级。每个贵族都将获得一个与其义务相对应的等级，然后由我们的政府在帝国周围分配土地以按照其等级供养。人们所能达到的等级取决于其能力，并且这条路必须是开放的，无关信仰或是出身。只有这样，我们才能确保为那些最有能力推动我们帝国前进的人进入宫廷。

original: Administrative penetration has been the greatest obstacle for any empire in this region. It is in the interest of the state to encourage economic productivity and we must at all times keep this in mind, while also keeping a constant watch on the regional economy. Solving this problem will require great resources and commitment, as there is no easy way to rule as many subjects as we aim to.\nLet us create an administration that conducts regular cadastral surveys of land, crops grown, land revenue, and local economy. Moreover we must demand cash payments of all our subjects at all times and offer lighter taxes when needed to encourage local economy.
translation: 行政渗透的不足已经成为任何帝国统治该地区的最大阻碍。鼓励经济生产力符合国家利益，我们必须时刻牢记这一点，同时也要不断关注区域经济。解决这个问题需要大量的资源和承诺，因为没有简单的方法来统治我们计划中如此之多的臣民。\n让我们建立一个政府机构来对土地，作物种植，土地收入和当地经济进行定期的地籍调查。此外，我们必须始终要求所有人以现金缴税，并在需要时要较低的税收以鼓励当地经济。

original: Religious Unity affects Devotion when changing Religion.
translation: 转变宗教时，宗教统一影响奉献度。

original: Religious Unity will not affect Devotion when changing Religion.
translation: 转变宗教时，宗教统一不影响奉献度。
统治者可以成为陆军将领。
统治者不能成为陆军将领。
继承人可以成为陆军将领。
继承人不能成为陆军将领。

original: Caedite eos. Novit enim Dominus qui sunt eius

translation: 不启用外国奴隶统治者。

original: New monarch is elected from available princes.
translation: 新任君主是从合适的王子中选出来的。
新任君主不是选举得出的。

original: Does not have a fixed dynasty.
Ruler does not have a harem.

translation: 能够任命帕夏 & 征募耶尼切里军团。
不启用商业共和国机制。
将外来文化同化并纳入行政体系。
不允许附庸之间的战争。

original: A Republic is a state ruled by its citizens. Power is not inherited but instead of the hands of an elected head of state.
translation: 共和国是一个由其公民统治的国家。权力不是世袭的，而是由选举产生的国家首脑掌握。

original: In a Theocracy authority is derived from a divine power. The ruling class will often be the clergy itself and the head of state their leader.
translation: 在神权制国家中，权力来自神的力量。统治阶级往往是神职人员，国家元首是他们中的领袖。

original: Ruled by a Muslim minority the Sultanates of India have had to evolve and expand the traditional Muslim ideas of Kingship. While they remain Islamic states the role of the Dhimmi, traditionally encompassing Jews and Christians, have been extended to the Dharmic religions.
translation: 作为统治者的穆斯林在国内属于少数派，印度苏丹国不得不改进和扩展传统的穆斯林王权理念。虽然他们仍然是伊斯兰国家，但传统意义上仅包含犹太教徒和基督徒的齐米这一身份已扩展到达摩宗教。
本地继承人支持的获得：每月$SUPPORT|+2$\n$MODIFIERS$\n

original: Maratha generals and civic leaders are an important part of the balance of power in our nation. We should formalize their assemblies and establish a permanent council of the Marathas to guide our nation.
translation: 马拉塔的将军和公民领袖是我们国家权力平衡的重要组成部分。我们应该正式组建他们的议会，建立一个常设内阁来引导我们的国家。

original: The state is taking measures to attract elite Rajput warriors from all over India. Steps should be taken to organize these warriors into cohesive regiments upon arrival so that they can be deployed more effectively.
translation: 此州正在设法招揽全印度的拉杰普特精英战士。并将采取措施，将这些战士组训成一团结的军团，以便更有效地发挥这些战士的战斗力。

original: The Marathas Estate Interaction §YRecruit Minister§! will instead recruit a General with §G1§! additional Shock.
translation: 马拉塔阶层互动§Y招募辅佐大臣§!将招募一位有额外§G1§!点冲击的将领。

original: The Rajputs Estate Interaction §YEnlist Purbias§! will give an additional §G5%§! discipline to Rajput Regiments.
translation: 拉杰普特阶层互动§Y征召普尔比亚人§!将给予拉杰普特军团额外§G5%§!的训练度。

original: The Most Serene Republic of Venice employs a complex and convoluted system for electing officials to public office. A series of secret ballots appoints 41 electors, who then each cast a vote into an urn. A single vote is extracted from the urn, and the man whose name is written on it becomes the new Doge. The system attempts to combat electoral corruption and ensure a fair vote.
translation: 最尊贵的威尼斯共和国采用复杂而繁琐的制度来选举官员。一系列无记名投票任命了41名选民，然后每个选民投票进入一个瓮。随后从瓮中随机抽取一张选票，该选票所选择的候选人就将成为新的总督。该选举系统的目的是避免选举腐败并确保公平投票。

original: Elections only occur when ruler dies.
translation: 仅在统治者死亡时进行选举。

original: Elections by majority votes are prone to corruption or worse, populism. We shall employ a complex system of allotment to determine who should lead our Republic by selecting almost at random from among a pool of suitable candidates.
translation: 多数票胜出的选举方式容易导致腐败、民粹主义，甚至更糟。我们将采用一个复杂的分配制度，通过从一群合适的候选人中随机选择来确定谁应该领导我们的共和国。

original: Let us abandon arbitrary appointments to governmental offices. Committees shall be established to decide on the best candidate for a given role to ensure that administrative competence is the norm in our realm.
translation: 让我们停止对公务员的随意任命。 应建立委员会来决定某一特定职位的最佳候选人，以确保在我们队伍中，行政能力称职成为常态。

original: The bureaucracy is expanding to meet the needs of the expanding bureaucracy.
translation: 官僚系统不断扩大自己，只为了满足其扩大自己的需求。

original: The Mongol Empire of Genghis Khan has been restored under our leadership. We are rebuilding the systems of government established by the Greaat Khan while avoiding the mistakes of his unworthy successors.
translation: 成吉思汗的蒙古帝国已经在我们的领导下重建。我们正在恢复大汗建立的行政体制，同时也要改正那些大汗的继承者犯下的错误。

original: The Mongol Empire of Genghis Khan has been restored under our leadership. We are rebuilding the systems of government established by the Greaat Khan while avoiding the mistakes of his unworthy successors.
translation: 成吉思汗的蒙古帝国已经在我们的领导下重建。我们正在恢复大汗建立的行政体制，同时也要改正那些大汗的继承者犯下的错误。

original: Ruler must not rule for life.
